TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AlarmType extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.AlarmType ElapsedRealtime = int32(3)

summary.para: Alarm time in (time since boot, including sleep). This alarm does not wake the device up; if it goes off while the device is asleep, it will not be delivered until the next time the device wakes up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.AlarmType ElapsedRealtimeWakeup = int32(2)

summary.para: Alarm time in (time since boot, including sleep), which will wake up the device when it goes off.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.AlarmType Rtc = int32(1)

summary.para: Alarm time in (wall clock time in UTC). This alarm does not wake the device up; if it goes off while the device is asleep, it will not be delivered until the next time the device wakes up.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.AlarmType RtcWakeup = int32(0)

summary.para: Alarm time in (wall clock time in UTC), which will wake up the device when it goes off.
